title: How to Reserve a Spot for an Event
content:
If a user asks how to reserve an event:

- Guide them to the CultPass app
- Instruct them to browse the experience catalog and tap 'Reserve'
- If it's a premium or limited event, check if reservation confirmation is required via email
- Remind them to arrive at least 15 minutes early with their QR code visible

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can reserve an experience by opening the CultPass app, selecting your desired event, and tapping 'Reserve'. Be sure to arrive 15 minutes early with your QR code ready."

title: What's Included in a CultPass Subscription
content:
Each user is entitled to 4 cultural experiences per month, which may include:
- Art exhibitions
- Museum entries
- Music concerts
- Film screenings and more

Some premium experiences may require an additional fee (visible in the app).

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your CultPass subscription includes 4 curated experiences each month. You can choose from museums, concerts, film events and more. Premium events may have an extra cost, which is shown during reservation."

title: How to Cancel or Pause a Subscription
content:
Users can manage their subscription via the app > 'My Account' > 'Manage Plan'.

- Cancel: Effective at the end of the billing cycle
- Pause: Preserves user data, resumes automatically when reactivated
- Do NOT offer refunds unless approved by support lead

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can cancel or pause your subscription at any time via the 'My Account' section in the CultPass app. Cancelation takes effect at the end of your billing cycle."

title: How to Handle Login Issues?
content:
Most login issues are resolved with password reset:

- Ask the user to tap 'Forgot Password' on the login screen
- Ensure they are using the correct registered email
- If they did not receive the reset email, check spam folder or retry after 10 minutes
- For persistent login issues, escalate to human support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try tapping 'Forgot Password' on the login screen. Make sure you're using the email associated with your account. If the email doesn't arrive, check spam or try again in a few minutes."

title: Troubleshooting App Crashes or Freezes
content:
If a user reports that the CultPass app is crashing:

- Ask them to force close the app and relaunch
- Confirm they are on the latest app version (App Store or Google Play)
- Suggest clearing app cache (Android) or rebooting the device
- If the problem persists, collect device model + OS version and escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Please try closing and reopening the app, and make sure you're on the latest version. If the issue continues, let me know your device model and OS version so I can help further."

title: Why an Experience Shows 'No Slots Available'
content:
If a user cannot reserve an experience due to unavailable slots:

- Explain that popular events fill quickly
- Suggest choosing another time slot or similar experience
- If it's a premium event, remind them it may have limited seating
- Inform them to check back later as slots may reopen after cancellations

**Suggested phrasing:**
"This event is currently full, but slots may reopen if others cancel. You can also explore similar experiences in the app."

title: How to Update Email or Personal Information
content:
Users can update their profile details in the CultPass app:

- Go to 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings'
- Edit fields like email, phone number, or name
- If the email is updated, remind them verification may be required
- For locked profiles or repeated failures, escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"You can update your email or personal details by visiting 'My Account' > 'Profile Settings' in the CultPass app."

title: Payment Failed or Card Declined
content:
If a renewal payment fails:

- Ask the user to confirm card details and sufficient balance
- Suggest adding a new payment method in the app
- Remind them that access may be temporarily paused until payment succeeds
- If multiple failures occur, escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Your payment didn’t go through. Please verify your card details or try adding a new payment method. Let me know if you need help."

title: Understanding Premium Experiences
content:
Some experiences require additional payment:

- Premium events offer exclusive access or limited seats
- Costs are shown clearly before reservation
- Users can pay through the app at checkout
- Normal monthly quota does not apply

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Premium experiences may require an extra fee, which you'll see before booking. These events are not deducted from your monthly quota."

title: How to Request a Refund
content:
Refunds for CultPass are limited:

- Refunds are only issued for duplicate charges, technical issues, or service outages
- Do NOT approve refunds unless authorized
- Collect transaction ID and last 4 digits of card
- Escalate cases that match refund policy

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Refunds are reviewed on a case-by-case basis. Could you share the transaction ID and last 4 digits of the card used? I will check this for you."

title: Why an Experience Was Cancelled by the Organizer
content:
If an event is cancelled:

- Inform the user that organizers may cancel due to low attendance, weather, or venue issues
- Reassure them that no quota will be deducted
- Suggest alternative events or rescheduling options
- For recurring cancellations, escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"This event was cancelled by the organizer due to unforeseen circumstances. Your quota remains unaffected, and you're welcome to book another experience."

title: Troubleshooting QR Code Not Scanning
content:
If a user can't scan their entry QR code:

- Ensure brightness is high and QR is fully visible
- Ask if they took a screenshot (these sometimes fail); recommend opening the live QR in the app
- Confirm they arrived at the right venue and time
- If attendance cannot be verified, contact event support

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Try increasing your screen brightness and opening the live QR within the app instead of a screenshot. Let me know if it still doesn’t scan."

title: Region or City Not Supported
content:
If a user doesn't see experiences in their area:

- Explain that CultPass availability varies by region
- Suggest entering a different nearby city in the app
- Confirm they allowed location permissions
- If their city is newly added but empty, escalate

**Suggested phrasing:**
"CultPass experiences vary by region. Try enabling location services or selecting a nearby city in the app."

title: Monthly Quota Not Updating After Attendance
content:
If a user attended an event but their quota didn't update:

- Confirm the reservation status marked as 'attended'
- Check for sync delays (up to 30 minutes)
- Ask them to refresh the app or log out and back in
- If still incorrect, escalate with reservation_id

**Suggested phrasing:**
"Sometimes quotas update with a slight delay. Please try refreshing the app. If it still looks incorrect, share your reservation ID so I can review."
